title: Jake Anto
description: Jake Anto's portfolio and blog, where he writes about Linux, AI, programming, and more.

items.title: A comprehensive guide to setting up NextDNS
items.content_html:
A comprehensive guide to setting up NextDNS

:material-shield: NextDNS is a DNS service that lets you block ads, trackers, malware, etc. This guide will help you set up your NextDNS configuration. You do not have to sign up for NextDNS to follow this guide.

items.title: Learn markdown in 10 minutes!
items.content_html:
Learn markdown in 10 minutes!

:material-language-markdown: Markdown is a simple markup language that allows you to write formatted text using a plain-text editor. It is a popular choice for writing documentation, blog posts, forum posts, and other content that is published online. If you don't know markdown already, this tutorial will teach you the basics.

items.title: Hello, World!
items.content_html:
Hello, World!

Everything starts with a Hello, World!, and so does my blog. Welcome to my blog!

items.title: How to get started with Git
items.content_html:
How to get started with Git

:material-git: Git is a free and open-source distributed version control system (VCS) designed for programmers to collaborate together on projects. Understanding Git is essential for anyone interested in contributing to open-source, and this tutorial will help you get started.
